preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Partenaire','Conjoint(e)','Enfant','Père','Mère') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'Lien_Dep');

changeSet.author: Yash

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Oui','Non') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'Informé du statut VIH du patient_Dep');

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Informé du statut VIH du patient_Dep Question

changeSet.author: Yash
